import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

n, k = map(int, input().split())

if n % k == 0:
    print(0)
else:
    print(1)

import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline().split()
    n = int(line[0])
    k = int(line[1])
    print(n % k)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import sys
from math import floor

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(floor(n / k))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
